tool_description: Analyzes video files to extract technical metadata including resolution, frame rate, codec, duration, and complexity metrics needed for optimal streaming configuration.

video_file_path.description: Full path to the video file to be analyzed

analysis_depth.description: Level of analysis: basic, standard, or detailed

error_messages: File not found: Verify the video_file_path exists and is accessible
Unsupported format: Use supported video formats (MP4, AVI, MOV, MKV, WebM)
Corrupted video file: Ensure the video file is not damaged or incomplete
usage: Provide the path to a video file and optionally specify analysis depth. The tool will return comprehensive metadata about the video's technical characteristics.

duration_seconds.description: Total duration of the video in seconds

bitrate_kbps.description: Original bitrate in kilobits per second
